name: Candy Shop
description:
Become an owner of a candy shop! You have to take orders from customers and complete them while they are coming towards you.

Have you ever dreamed of becoming a candy seller? This is the opportunity to test your skills in it. But... There is a slight problem. Your customers turned out to be teeth! If you don't feed them all they will chew you up and spit you out. Watch for the customer's wishes and shoot them with the right food. You definitely don't want a hungry and angry customer.

To pick up the right food just move towards the container on any side and touch it. However, watch out for the rest of the food because it will come rushing back at you right after  you picked one up.

Controls:

- Press arrow keys to move left and right (or you can use A and D)

- Press space to shoot

Yes, it is that simple!The story of this game

Originally, this game was made for a small three-day game jam but unfortunately due to the hectic schedule hadn't been finished in time for the deadline. I decided to  post it anyway to not to waste all the work I have put it.

The great news is that you can access the source code !

Here is the link to a GitHub Project https://github.com/malkoTV/Candy-shop
